```{r remove}
{
  ver1<-packageVersion("apmrt")
  remove.packages("apmrt")
  .rs.restartR()
}
```

```{r install}
{
  devtools::install_github("alexandretorrejano/apmrt")
  library(apmrt)
  cat(paste("\nVersion as of Script Call:",ver1))
  cat(paste("\nNewly Installed Version:  ",packageVersion("apmrt")))
  rm(ver1)
}
```
